title: Add an option to show additional tickets fields on the helpdesk

body:
## Checklist before requesting a review

*Please delete options that are not relevant.*

- [X] I have performed a self-review of my code.
- [X] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works.

## Description

Formcreator has a specific "extended" view that show the itil column on the ticket form.
We must also offer this option in native forms as it might be useful for some people (but it is disabled by default).
